title: Yet another HUD post, although this time, Positive!
body:
I believe there should be an option to change it to suit your own personal play style, and I used to say that about the old HUD aswell.
but I don't think the community should be so quick to say that they 'hate' the new HUD, I mean seriously? it hasn't been out very long at all. Give it a chance, let the game grow, fixes will come, and eventually, you'll start to forget how you ever functioned with the old one.

I'm all for the new HUD, open your eyes, they have made things better, with less.
not only does it simplify certain aspects of the game, its more user friendly to newer players, minimizing the learning curve.
With less on screen, it should give you 'poor' league players enough room to concentrate and win more games.

I don't want to {{champion:245}} what somebody has already written, but there is to much negativity on these boards its {{summoner:3}}ing

replies.body: League is still broken for me so I haven't had the chance to use it. It looks a lot better than the old one though, and I'm looking forward to using it.
